```{r connect}
library(ggalluvial)
# 创建数据框
df <- data.frame(
  from = c("A1", "A1", "A2", "A2", "A3", "A3"),
  to = c("B1", "B2", "B1", "B2", "B1", "B2"),
  Freq = c(10, 20, 30, 40, 50, 60)
)
# 绘制桑基图h u
# 假设您有一个名为df的数据框，其中包含桑基图所需的数据
ggplot(df, aes(y = Freq, axis1 = from, axis2 = to)) +
  geom_alluvium(aes(fill = to), width = 1/12) +
  geom_stratum(width = 1/12, fill = "black", color = "grey") +
  geom_text(stat = "stratum", aes(label = after_stat(stratum)))
```

```{r plot}
data <- Gwas %>% make_long(MyList, `GWAS (NHGRI-EBI)`)
data
##'@指定绘图显示顺序
data$node <- factor(data$node, levels = c(rev(unique(Gwas$`GWAS (NHGRI-EBI)`)),rev(unique(Gwas$MyList))))
data
```

```{r plot}
ggplot(data, aes(x = x, next_x = next_x, node = node, next_node = next_node,
                fill = node, label = node)) +
  #设置
  geom_sankey(flow.fill="#DFDFDF",#连线颜色
              flow.alpha = 0.5, ## 条带透明度
              flow.color="grey60",#连线边框颜色
              #node.fill=dittoColors()[1:36],#节点颜色，[1:36]数值需要根据自己的数据进行修改
              width=0.2) + #node的宽度
  #设置桑葚图文字
  geom_sankey_text(size = 3,#文字大小
                   color= "black",#文字颜色
                   hjust=1) + #文字位置，右对齐
  theme_void()+
  #隐藏图例
  theme(legend.position = 'none') 

```

```{r slect}
bac_gene
bac_Actinomyces_oris<-bac_gene %>% filter(Bacteria=="Actinomyces oris")
Gwas1<- Gwas %>% filter( MyList %in% as.vector(bac_Actinomyces_oris$External_Name))

data1 <- Gwas1 %>% make_long(MyList, `GWAS (NHGRI-EBI)`)
##'@指定绘图显示顺序
data1$node <- factor(data1$node, levels = c(rev(unique(Gwas1$`GWAS (NHGRI-EBI)`)),rev(unique(Gwas1$MyList))))
data1

mycol3 <- c("red", "green", "blue") # 定义一个包含三种颜色的颜色向量

##'@代码一
ggplot(data1, aes(x = x, next_x = next_x, node = node, next_node = next_node,
               fill = node, label = node)) +
  scale_fill_manual(values = mycol3)+
  
  geom_sankey(flow.alpha = 0.5, #条带不透明度
                  smooth = 7, #条带弯曲度
                  width = 0.18) + #节点宽度
  geom_sankey_text(size = 3.2, color = 'black') +
  theme_void() +
  theme(legend.position = 'none') #隐藏图例

ggsave("桑基图.jpg",width = 6, height = 4)

```
